com.revolsys.data.record.schema

Class FieldDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.io.AbstractObjectWithProperties
      • com.revolsys.data.record.schema.FieldDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapSerializer, ObjectWithProperties, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFileGdbFieldDefinition, JdbcFieldDefinition

    public class FieldDefinition
extends AbstractObjectWithProperties
implements Cloneable, MapSerializer
    The FieldDefinition class defines the name, type and other properties about each attribute on a Record in the RecordDefinition.
    Author:
    Paul Austin
    See Also:
    Record, RecordDefinition

      • toMap

        public Map<String,Object> toMap()
        Description copied from interface: MapSerializer

        Convert the object to a Map of property name, value pairs. The values can be one of the following supported types. Other values should be converted to one of these values.

        • boolean or Boolean
        • byte or Byte
        • short or Short
        • int or Integer
        • long or Long
        • float or Float
        • double or Double
        • String
        • Number subclasses
        • Collection of supported values
        • Map of supported values
        • null
        Specified by:
        toMap in interface MapSerializer
        Returns:

      • toString
